verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \add that\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* in the \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \add day\add* of the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add even\add* in \w Chisleu|strong="H3691"\w*;

When they had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w Sherezer|strong="H8272"\w* and \w Regem-melech|strong="H7278"\w*, and their \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, to \w pray|strong="H2470"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,\f + \fr 7.2 \ft pray…: Heb. intreat the face of\f*

\add And\add* to \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* which \add were\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and to the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Should I \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w separating|strong="H5144"\w* myself, as I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* these so many \w years|strong="H8141"\w*?
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When ye \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* and \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* and \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \add month\add*, even those \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, did ye at \w all|strong="H6684"\w* \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* unto me, \add even\add* to me?

And when ye did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and when ye did \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, did not ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add for yourselves\add*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add for yourselves\add*?\f + \fr 7.6 \ft did not ye: or, be not ye they that\f*

\add Should ye\add* not \add hear\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, when \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* was \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* and in \w prosperity|strong="H7961"\w*, and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof round about \w her|strong="H5439"\w*, when \add men\add* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* and the \w plain|strong="H8219"\w*?\f + \fr 7.7 \ft Should…: or, Are not these the words\f*\f + \fr 7.7 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Execute|strong="H8199"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w compassions|strong="H7356"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*:\f + \fr 7.9 \ft Execute…: Heb. Judge judgment of truth\f*

And \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* not the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, nor the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, nor the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*; and let none of you \w imagine|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H0376"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* in your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

But they \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*, and pulled \w away|strong="H5414"\w* the \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*, and \w stopped|strong="H3513"\w* their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, that they should not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 7.11 \ft pulled…: Heb. they gave a backsliding shoulder\f*\f + \fr 7.11 \ft stopped: Heb. made heavy\f*

Yea, they \w made|strong="H7760"\w* their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \add as\add* an adamant \w stone|strong="H8068"\w*, lest they should \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* in his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*: therefore came a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.  +  r 7.12  t by: Heb. by the hand of *

Therefore it is come to pass, \add that\add* as he \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, and they would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; so they \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, and I would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*:

But I scattered them with a \w whirlwind|strong="H5590"\w* among all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whom they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not. Thus the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, that no man passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* nor \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*: for they \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* the \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft pleasant…: Heb. land of desire\f*
